Row.Label: Accounts receivable, less allowances of $52 and $47, respectively
Property, plant and equipment, net
Row.ShortDefinition: Tangible assets that are held by an entity for use in the production or supply of goods and services, for rental to others,...
Row.ElementDefenition: Tangible assets that are held by an entity for use in the production or supply of goods and services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes and that are expected to provide economic benefit for more than one year; net of accumulated depreciation. Examples include land, buildings, and production equipment. Also includes software programs or applications for internal use (that is, not to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed to others) that qualify for capitalization.

Row.Label: Common stock, no par value; 1,800,000,000 shares authorized; 899,805,500 and 888,325,973 shares issued and outstanding, respectively
